Key Match Events: Shaheen Afridi took 6 wickets for 25 runs, the best bowling figures in a T20 World Cup match
Babar Azam and Mohammad Rizwan scored unbeaten 68 and 78 respectively, setting a new record for the highest partnership in a T20 World Cup match
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli expressed disappointment with the team's performance and acknowledged that Pakistan outplayed them
Babar Azam was proud of the team's victory and stated that it was just the start for them
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Dubai International Cricket Stadium
The victory marked Pakistan's first win over India in a World Cup match in 29 years
Others: The match was a part of the Super 12 stage of the T20 World Cup 2021
The result of the match significantly impacted the standings in the group
